item.title: Trailer

item.author: jen@jencraigevans.com
item.title: E001 Origin Story
item.description:
This is the origin story of the podcast; that is how I have come to find myself sitting on the floor of a closet, with an old foam mattress topper wrapped around me, speaking into the ether of a microphone with who knows who on the other end.
In this episode, I share with you how the podcast was born out of a strange calling during an exquisitely challenging time; right in the middle of our collective chaos that was 2020.
Podcast Music by my dear friend Justin Barnard https://www.instagram.com/justinvolution/
Sound Engineering done by the talented Adnan Coban https://www.instagram.com/aceymusic/
